text: is a Japanese airport on the island of Dōgo which is one of the Oki Islands. Information about Oki Airport. Retrieved 2012-1-22. The airport is in the town of Okinoshima. This is part of the Shimane Prefecture.隠岐空港について ( About Oki Airport). Retrieved 2012-1-22. It is officially classified as a 3rd class airport. == Related pages== * List of airports in Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * Oki Airport guide Category:Airports in Japan Category:Shimane Prefecture
title: Oki Airport
